name: 2020 2nd Asia Pacific Information Technology Conference APIT
content: Conference official website：http://www.apit.net Meeting time：January 17-19, 2020\. Meeting place：Bali Island, Indonesia/Kuta Central Park Hotel. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. YAMAZAKI Tatsuya from Niigata University, Japan. Prof. Yong Jin Park, University Malaysia Sabah, Malaysia. Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University, Taiwan. Published by： 1\. APIT 2020 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopu and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Call for Papers： Information Theory. Automata Theory. Artificial & Computational Intelligence. Control Theory. Signal & Image Processing. Pattern Recognition. Data Mining. Computer Vision. Modeling and Optimization. Nano Computing. Information & Knowledge. Design System & Algorithm. Information Systems and Technology. International Business. Hardware and Software Co-design. Health and Medical Science and Technology. Human-Computer Interaction. Image and Signal Processing. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : September 1, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : September 25, 2019\. Registration Deadline: October 15, 2019\. Conference Contact :Mr. Paul Choo. mailbox: apit.conference@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560
